https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2Zl5HzLTrjOPJKuHPraVPEn2Er.jpg This overview of the horrors of 20th century war reminds us that war does not end when peace treaties are signed and the soldiers have gone home. Aftermath: The Remnants of War
